name: Herbert Crawler Post LD Edition
description:
A game made for the Ludum Dare October Challenge 2014 game jam.

Herbert Crawler is a pixel-art roguelite where you play as a gentleman archaeologist exploring the dark depths of ancient dungeons.

New features:

- More maps
- Mushrooms
- Potions
- Spikes
- Chests
- Fullscreen
- Saving
- New weapons & armour
- New tile textures
- Music by Kevin MacLeod
- Procedurally generated dungeons

Controls:

WASD to move

Arrows to attack with item in hotbar

E to use item in hotbar

Q Inventory

Esc Pause menu

F11 Fullscreen

F5 Save

F9 Load

F1 GUI

F2 Map editor

F3 Console

F4 Mute music

This game was written in C++ using SDL2 for Ludum Dare 29 and developed further into a Post LD Edition. The theme was "beneath the surface". The version submitted here is my entry for the October Challenge. It is the first game I have made.
